md:
giải nghĩa từ "literature" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Literature (n.)

* Meaning: Written works, especially those considered to have artistic or intellectual value.
* Vietnamese: Văn học
* Part of speech: Noun
* Example sentence: "The literature on the subject is vast and complex."
* Related words: Literary, Literate, Literature review.

Literary (adj.)

* Meaning: Relating to literature or writing.
* Vietnamese: Văn học
* Part of speech: Adjective
* Example sentence: "The literary magazine published her short story."
* Related words: Literature, Literate, Literary criticism.

Literate (adj.)

* Meaning: Able to read and write.
* Vietnamese: Biết đọc biết viết
* Part of speech: Adjective
* Example sentence: "The literate population of the country is increasing."
* Related words: Literature, Literary, Illiterate.

Literature review (n.)

* Meaning: A critical analysis of the existing research on a particular topic.
* Vietnamese: Tổng quan văn học
* Part of speech: Noun
* Example sentence: "The researcher conducted a literature review to identify gaps in the existing research."
* Related words: Literature, Research, Academic writing.

Note: The Vietnamese translations are provided in the Northern accent.
